workshop.title: VBCS Integration with Cloud Databases
workshop.description: Connecting both Oracle and non-Oracle Databases, including relational, NoSQL, and graph databases, to VBCS.

labs.title: Lab 100: Creating Your First Web App
labs.description: This lab will start with creating your first Web App in VBCS.

labs.title: Lab 200:  Connecting VBCS to an Oracle Database
labs.description: Oracle offers quick tools to integrate Oracle Cloud Databases with VBCS.

labs.title: Lab 300:  Connecting to Firebase Database
labs.description: Connecting VBCS to a Firebase Realtime Database.

labs.title: Lab 400: Connecting VBCS to a Graph Database
labs.description: Learning how Graph Databases work, specifically, a free Graph Database called Neo4j.
